Detailed Description

Serialization / compression of bvector<>. Set theoretical operations on compressed BLOBs.

Definition in file bmserial.h.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ BM_SER_NEXT_GRP

#define BM_SER_NEXT_GRP (   enc,
  nb,
  B_1ZERO,
  B_8ZERO,
  B_16ZERO,
  B_32ZERO,
  B_64ZERO 
)
Value:
if (nb == 1u) \
enc.put_8(B_1ZERO); \
else if (nb < 256u) \
{ \
enc.put_8(B_8ZERO); \
enc.put_8((unsigned char)nb); \
} \
else if (nb < 65536u) \
{ \
enc.put_8(B_16ZERO); \
enc.put_16((unsigned short)nb); \
} \
else if (nb < bm::id_max32) \
{ \
enc.put_8(B_32ZERO); \
enc.put_32(unsigned(nb)); \
} \
else \
{\
enc.put_8(B_64ZERO); \
enc.put_64(nb); \
}
bm::id_max32
const unsigned id_max32
Definition: bmconst.h:50
